dc_title_s: Map of the country from Lake Superior to the Pacific Ocean : From the latest explorations and surveys, to accompany the report of the New York Chamber of Commerce, April 1868
dc_description_s: Map of the western United States showing drainage, cities and towns, military posts, railroads, and the Northern Pacific Railroad in red. Includes a profile of the line.|Negative photostat from unknown source.; Relief shown by hachures.|48 x 112 centimeters, on sheet 77 x 132 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:3,100,000|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: G. W. & C. B. Colton (New York)
